news.title: 3rd SpaceX's Next Starship Prototype Taking Shape
news.content: 3rd Construction of the test craft is proceeding apace, as two new photos posted on Twitter today (Sept. 17) by company founder and CEO Elon Musk reveal.

news.title: 3rd NASA's Juno Mission Cheks Out Eclipse on Jupiter
news.previewContent: 3rd All is well on our largest neighbor; NASA's Juno...
news.content: 3rd All is well on our largest neighbor; NASA's Juno spacecraft just managed to spot the shadow of Jupiter's moon, Io, passing over its marbled clouds.

news.title: 3rd Europe Wants Ideas for Cave-Spelumking Moon Robots
news.content: 3rd As NASA makes a big push to land humans on the moon's surface by 2024, the European Space Agency (ESA) wants to learn more about the lunar caves that lie beneath.
